views.Settings.AddEditNode.lndhubWarning: Na chochote cha LNDHub, mwendeshaji anaweza kufuatilia salio lako, shughuli, anwani zako za IP unazounganisha nazo, na hata kukimbia na pesa zako.
views.Settings.AddEditNode.lndhubFriend: Ikiwa una rafiki ambaye unamwamini na anamiliki nodi ya LND, unaweza kumwomba aweke kwenye LNDHub ili uweze kuunganishwa nayo.
views.Settings.AddEditNode.certificateWa: Kuchagua kutokutumia Uthibitisho wa Cheti kunaweza kukufanya uwe hatarini kwa shambulio la mtu katikati. Fanya hivyo kwa uamuzi wako mwenyewe.
Ikiwa hauthibitishi muunganisho wako na VPN au Usanidi wa Huduma iliyofichwa ya Tor v3, tunapendekeza sana uweke cheti cha nodi yako kwenye kifaa hiki.

views.Settings.CertInstallInstructions.g: Ili kusakinisha cheti kwenye Android, nakili faili ya cheti kwenye kifaa chako. Kisha nenda kwa Mipangilio > Usalama > Sakinisha kutoka uhifadhi. Inapaswa kugundua cheti na kuruhusu uikusanye kwenye kifaa. Cheti hicho kinapaswa kuwa na kipengele cha .crt

Ili kusakinisha cheti kwenye iOS, hamisha faili kwenye kifaa chako. Mara tu unapochagua faili kwenye kifaa chako, utaulizwa kuisakinisha kama wasifu. Lazima uwezeshe cheti chako kwa Mkuu > Kuhusu > Mipangilio ya usalama wa cheti. Cheti hicho kinapaswa kuwa na kipengele cha .crt
Kwa upande mwingine, unaweza kupeana wasifu na cheti kwa simu yako katika XCode.
Unaweza kufikia cheti wakati wowote kwenye Mipangilio > Kuu > Profaili na kuiondoa ikihitajika.

Ikiwa unajiunga na nodi yako kupitia jina la mwenyeji wa nje au kupitia Tor unapaswa kuongeza jina la mwenyeji kwenye cheti. lnd hutoa chaguo hili kufanya hivyo na chaguo la TLSExtraDomain katika usanidi wake. Utalazimika kufuta na kuzalisha upya cheti baada ya kufanya mabadiliko hayo.

views.ImportAccount.title: Ingiza akaunti
views.ImportAccount.extendedPubKey: Extended Public Key (xpub, zpub, tpub, etc.)
views.ImportAccount.masterKeyFingerprint: Alama ya Kidole ya Fumbo la Msingi
views.ImportAccount.existingAccountNote: If importing an existing account, ZEUS will initiate a rescan from the block height specified below. Please leave the app open for up to 10 minutes for balances to be reflected accurately
views.ImportAccount.existingAccountNote2: For best results, set block height to the block right before the first transaction received to this external wallet.
views.ImportAccount.note: NOTE: Events (deposits/spends) for keys derived from an account will only be detected by LND if they happen after the import. Rescans to detect past events will be supported later on.
views.ImportAccount.Warning.text1: Importing external accounts is currently an experimental feature.
views.ImportAccount.Warning.text2: By hitting 'I Understand' you are agreeing to proceed at your own risk.
views.ImportAccount.Warning.text3: If crafting a channel open with an external account, please follow all instructions on screen and DO NOT broadcast the transaction from anywhere except your ZEUS wallet.

views.Wallet.Wallet.expressGraphSync: Zeus inaendesha kusawazisha haraka ya grafu. Shikilia.
views.Wallet.KeypadPane.lspExplainerFirs: Inapendekezwa kwamba malipo yako ya kwanza ya kupokea ya Lightning yawe 100,000 sats au zaidi; kiasi kikubwa zaidi ni bora zaidi. Ada ya usanidi itatozwa kutoka kwa kiasi hiki.
views.Wallet.KeypadPane.lspExplainer: Utatozwa ada ya usanidi ikiwa italipwa kupitia lightning.

views.Channel.title: Channel
views.Channel.localReserve.info: The minimum satoshis your node is required to reserve on your side of the channel. It is used to prevent cheating.
views.Channel.remoteReserve.info: The minimum satoshis your counterparty is required to reserve on their side of the channel. It is used to prevent cheating.
views.Channel.csvDelay.info1: CSV delay, or time-lock delay, is a security feature in the Lightning Network that prevents premature channel closings. It's a built-in delay that uses time to enforce security and give both parties time to resolve issues before funds are released.
views.Channel.csvDelay.info2: You will have to wait this duration to access your funds on-chain if you are the initiator of a force close.
views.Channel.closingRate: (Hiari) Sat kwa vbyte ada ya kufunga
views.Channel.externalAddress.info: If specified, your channel funds will be sent to this external address, instead of an address in the internal wallet.

views.Intro.quickStartExplainer: Your own node on the phone
views.Intro.carousel1.title: Malipo unayoweza kuiamini
views.Intro.carousel1.text: ZEUS inaendesha nodi ya Bitcoin na Lightning kuthibitisha na kuhifadhi siri ya shughuli zako.
views.Intro.carousel2.title: Uhamishaji kwenye minyororo
views.Intro.carousel2.text: Fanya uhamisho wa kawaida wa Bitcoin kwenye minyororo na Zeus.
views.Intro.carousel3.title: Malipo ya Umeme
views.Intro.carousel3.text: Fanya malipo ya (karibu) papo hapo, kwa ada ndogo, kwa kutumia mtandao wa lightning.
views.Intro.carousel4.title: Kudhibiti lightning
views.Intro.carousel4.text: Nenda zaidi ya pochi ya kawaida ya Bitcoin na usimamie vituo vyako vya lightning, upatikanaji wa fedha, na mengi zaidi.
views.Intro.errorCreatingWallet: Kosa la kuunda pochi. Anza upya programu na jaribu tena.
views.OpenChannel.importText: Imegundua URI ya Node ifuatayo kwenye ubao wako wa kunakili
views.Payment.title: Malipo
views.PaymentRequest.title: Ombi la Lightning
views.PaymentRequest.feeEstimateExceedsL: Kadirio la ada kwa malipo haya ni kubwa kuliko kikomo kilichowekwa hapa chini. Fikiria kuongeza kikomo cha ada ili kuepuka kushindwa kwa malipo.
views.PaymentRequest.amp: Jaribu malipo ya atomic ya njia nyingi
views.PaymentRequest.maxPartsDescription: Idadi kubwa ya malipo ya sehemu ambayo inaweza kutumika kukamilisha kiasi kamili.
views.PaymentRequest.lndGettingReady: LND inajiandaa kufanya malipo. Tafadhali subiri.
views.PaymentRequest.lndGettingReadyRece: LND inajiandaa kupokea malipo. Tafadhali subiri.
views.PaymentRequest.notAllowedToSend: This wallet is not allowed to send funds!
views.Receive.title: Pokea
views.Receive.warningLndHub: Tafadhali kumbuka kwamba LNDHub ina anwani ya mnara iliyowekwa
views.Receive.p2wkhDescription: Aina ya anwani ya kisasa inayosaidia kuhifadhi ada kwa malipo ya kuingia na kutoka.
views.Receive.np2wkhDescription: Tumia tu wakati huduma inaiweka anwani yako ya SegWit au Taproot kuwa batili.
views.Receive.np2wkhDescriptionAlt: Tumia tu wakati huduma inaiweka anwani yako ya SegWit kuwa batili.
views.Receive.p2trDescription: Aina ya anwani ya Bitcoin ya hivi karibuni na yenye nguvu zaidi. Haijatambuliwa sana.
views.Receive.lspExplainerUnified: LSP itachukua kiasi hiki kama ada ya usanidi, ikiwa italipwa kupitia mtandao wa lightning:
views.Receive.lspExplainer: LSP itachukua kiasi hiki kama ada ya usanidi:
views.Receive.lspExplainerRoutingUnified: LSP itachukua kiasi hiki kama ada, ikiwa italipwa kupitia mtandao wa lightning:
views.Receive.lspExplainerRouting: LSP itachukua kiasi hiki kama ada:
views.Receive.lspSwitchExplainer1: LSP itakupa vituo vya 0-uthibitisho ambavyo vitakuruhusu kutuma na kupokea malipo kwenye mtandao wa Lightning.
views.Receive.lspSwitchExplainer2: LSP pia itafunika ankara zako, hivyo kufanya iwe rahisi kupokea malipo wakati huo huo kuhifadhi faragha yako.
views.Receive.routeHintSwitchExplainer1: Vidokezo vya njia hutoa habari za kutambua vituo visivyotangazwa, au visivyojulikana. Hii inaruhusu upelekaji wa malipo kwa nodi ambazo hazionekani hadharani kwenye mtandao.
views.Receive.routeHintSwitchExplainer2: Ni muhimu kubadilisha vidokezo vya njia kama unaotumia vituo visivyotangazwa tu, au kama mtu anayejaribu kukulipa hawezi kukufikia kupitia vituo vyako vilivyotangazwa.
views.Receive.routeHintSwitchExplainer3: Route hints are automatically enabled when you only have unannounced channels
views.Receive.ampSwitchExplainer1: Malipo ya Atomic Multi-path (AMP) ni aina mpya ya malipo ya Lightning ambayo yanaweza kulipwa mara kadhaa.
views.Receive.ampSwitchExplainer2: Tafadhali kumbuka kuwa ankara za AMP kwa sasa zinafaa kwa nodi za LND pekee.
views.Receive.lspZeroAmt: LSP haiwezi kutumiwa na kiasi cha sifuri. Ankara isiyo fungwa imeundwa. Ufunguo wako wa umma wa nodi utafichuliwa.
views.Receive.blindedPathsExplainer1: Using blinded paths in your invoice is an advanced privacy technique that allows you to hide your node's' public key, which is typically revealed in most lightning invoices.
views.Receive.blindedPathsExplainer2: Note that not all wallets support paying BOLT 11 invoices with blinded paths yet, and that the possiblity of payment success may decrease.
views.Send.title: Tuma
views.Send.onChainNotSupported: Uhamisho kwa mtandao wa chaini hauungi mkono kwenye
views.Send.keysendNotSupported: haishughulikii malipo ya keysend kwa sasa.
views.Send.noOnchainBalance: Hakuna salio la chaini inapatikana. Funga kituo au pokea uhamisho wa mtandao wa chaini kwanza.
views.Send.noLightningBalance: Hakuna salio la lightning inapatikana. Fungua kituo au pokea malipo ya lightning kwanza.
views.Send.zaplockerWarning: Hii ni ankara ya Zaplocker ambayo itashikilia malipo hadi masaa 24. Fungua ZEUS mara kwa mara baada ya malipo ili kusaidia kupunguza hatari ya kufungwa kwa lazima cha kituo. Endelea kwa hatari yako mwenyewe.
views.SendingLightning.lowFeeLimitMessag: Malipo haya yaweza kuwa yameshindwa kutokana na kikomo cha ada cha chini. Jaribu tena na kikomo cha ada kikubwa zaidi
views.SendingLightning.copyPaymentHash: Nakili Hash kwenye Ubao wa Kunakili
views.SendingLightning.inTransit: Malipo yako yamo kwenye njia. Yanaweza kukamilika muda mfupi au yanaweza kushindwa. Tafadhali angalia baadaye.
views.SendingLightning.isZaplocker: Malipo ya Zaplocker kwenye njia. Yanaweza kukamilika muda mfupi, vinginevyo fedha zitarudi kwako ndani ya masaa 24. Tafadhali angalia baadaye.

views.Settings.Privacy.lurkerMode.explai: Hali ya Lurker inaficha thamani zote nyeti kwa kuzibadilisha kuwa herufi za Kigiriki za kale.

Long press any hidden value to temporarily reveal the actual data for a few seconds.
views.Settings.Privacy.clipboard.explain: Ukiwezesha, Zeus itasoma thamani zilizonakiliwa kwenye ubao wako wa kunakili na kukuarifu ikiwa zinaweza kutumika kwenye programu.
views.Settings.Privacy.enableMempoolRate: Wezesha mapendekezo ya ada ya Mempool.space

views.Settings.Seed.title: Hifadhi mkoba
views.Settings.Seed.text1: Maneno 24 yafuatayo ni nakala yako ya hifadhi ya pochi.
views.Settings.Seed.text2: IHIFADHI SALAMA kwa sababu yeyote anayeona maneno haya anaweza kuiba fedha zako.
views.Settings.Seed.text3: Jihadhari na udanganyifu. Wafanyakazi wa msaada wa Zeus hawatakuuliza maneno haya.
views.Settings.Seed.text4: Kwenye skrini inayofuata, bonyeza kila sehemu ili kuonyesha neno la hifadhi.
views.Settings.Seed.dangerousText1: Je, unataka kunakili maneno yako 24 ya hifadhi kwenye ubao wako wa kunakili?
views.Settings.Seed.dangerousText2: Hii NI HATARI. Maneno yako yanaweza kusomwa na programu nyingine unazofungua. Endelea kwa uangalifu.
views.Settings.Seed.dangerousButton: Nakili hatari maneno kwenye ubao wa kunakili
views.Settings.SeedRecovery.title: Wallet recovery
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.title: Nodi iliyowekwa
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.NeutrinoPeer: Weka rika unazotaka kupakua vichwa vya masanduku kutoka kwazo na kutangaza shughuli kupitia.
Unganisha tu na rika zilizoelezwa. Kuwezesha hii kunaweza kupunguza kasi ya kufuata masanduku, lakini inaweza kusaidia ikiwa una matatizo ya kutangaza shughuli.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.ZeroConfPeer: Weka rika unazotaka kukubali njia za umeme za sifuri, zaidi ya LSP.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.expressGraph: Wezesha sync ya haraka ya grafu (EGS)

Pakua data ya vumi ya mtandao wa Lightning wakati wa kuanza. Hii itafanya pathfinding iwe ya kuaminika zaidi wakati wa kujaribu kufanya malipo. Anza tena programu ili kuanza kutumika. Pia inajulikana kama Speedloader.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.resetExpress: Futa upya sync ya haraka ya grafu wakati wa kuanza
Lazima kupakua data mpya ya sync ya haraka ya grafu wakati wa kuanza.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.bimodalPathf: Tumia mtathmini wa uwezekano wa Bimodal, badala ya mtathmini wa awali wa apriori, wakati wa kujaribu kufanya malipo. Anza tena programu ili kuanza kutumika.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.waitForGraph: Ngoja sync ya grafu kabla ya kulipa
Kusubiri mtandao wa lightning kusawazisha grafu yako itaongeza uwezekano wako wa mafanikio ya malipo.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.rescan.subti: Skena blockchain kwa ajili ya miamala yako kwenye-laini. Anza tena programu ili mabadiliko yafanye kazi. Yatafutwa baada ya kukamilika.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.compactDb.su: Whether the databases used within LND should automatically be compacted on startup. This is disabled by default because it increases startup time and requires additional disk space to be available during the compaction that is freed afterwards. In general compaction leads to smaller database files.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.stopLndDelet: Stop LND and delete Neutrino files
Upon restart, blockchain header sync will start from scratch and will take several minutes to complete.
Run your LND node with Tor.
Note that calls to rates and Mempool.space endpoints will still be made on clearnet.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.persistentMo: Continue to run LND in the background even when the app is closed.
Continue to run LND and Tor in the background even when the app is closed.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.resetMission: Hii itaweka upya hali ya maelekezo ya malipo. Inaweza kuwa na manufaa kama una matatizo kupata njia wakati wa kufanya malipo.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.automaticDis: Wezesha sajili za moja kwa moja
Unda moja kwa moja data ya uokoaji wa majanga na itume kwenye huduma ya Olympus ya sajili. Data ya uokoaji wa majanga inaweza kukusaidia kupata fedha zako za umeme kwenye kifaa kwa kifadhaiko kibaya.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.clipboardDis: Hamisha data ya uokoaji kwenye ubao wa kunakili

Hii itahamisha data yako ya uokoaji wa majanga kwenye ubao wa kunakili. Toa toleo la karibuni la kamba hii katika mchakato wa kupona kwa pochi ili kusababisha kufunga kwa lazima ya vituo vyako vyote vya mawasiliano. Fedha zitarudi kwenye pochi yako kwenye-laini.
Ni utaratibu mzuri kuunda data mpya ya uokoaji wa majanga baada ya kila kituo kipya unachofungua ikiwa hauitumii sajili za moja kwa moja.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.exportDisast: Fanya sajili ya uokoaji kwenye Olympus
Fanya sajili ya uokoaji wa majanga kwenye huduma ya sajili ya Olympus kwa mkono.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.initiateDisa: Anzisha uokoaji wa majanga kutoka Olympus
Pakua data ya uokoaji wa majanga kwa mkono kutoka kwenye huduma ya sajili ya Olympus na anzisha uokoaji.
Tambua kwamba hii itafunga vituo vyako vyote na kurudisha salio lao kwenye pochi yako kwenye-laini mara tu zitakapopatikana.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.initiateAdva: Anzisha uokoaji wa majanga ya juu kutoka Olympus
Pakua data ya zamani ya uokoaji wa majanga kwa mkono kutoka kwenye huduma ya sajili ya Olympus na anzisha uokoaji.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.initiateDisa: Manually restore recovery data from the clipboard.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.AdvancedDisa: Imeshindwa kupakia sajili. Tafadhali jaribu tena baadaye.
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.AdvancedResc: Kick off a rescan from a specific block height
views.Settings.EmbeddedNode.LNDLogs.copy: Nakili magogo kwenye ubao wa kunakili

views.BumpFee.title: Haraka malipo
views.BumpFee.outpoint.explainer1: An outpoint is a reference to a particular output of a previous transaction. It consists of two parts:
views.BumpFee.outpoint.explainer2: 1) Transaction ID (txid): This is a unique identifier for a specific transaction on the Bitcoin blockchain.
views.BumpFee.outpoint.explainer3: 2) Output Index (vout): This denotes which specific output of the referenced transaction is being spent.
views.BumpFee.outpoint.explainer4: The two are combined with a : character, for example: a1075db55d416d3ca199f55b6084e2115b9345e16c5cf302fc80e9d5fbf5d48d:0
views.BumpFee.outpoint.explainer5: This is the first output in this transaction, as the output index starts at 0. The second output has vout 1, etc.
views.BumpFee.budget.explainer1: The max amount in sats that can be used as the fees. Setting this value greater than the input's value may result in CPFP - one or more wallet utxos will be used to pay the fees specified by the budget.
views.BumpFee.budget.explainer2: If not set, for new inputs, by default 50% of the input's value will be treated as the budget for fee bumping; for existing inputs, their current budgets will be retained.
views.BumpFee.immediate.explainer: Whether this input will be swept immediately. When enabled, the sweeper will sweep this input without waiting for the next batch.

views.LSPS1.timeoutError: Did not receive response from server
views.LSPS1.serviceInfoText1: This service allows you to purchase channels in advance from the LSP directly. Channels must confirm on-chain before you can use them.
views.LSPS1.serviceInfoText2: If you don't want to wait for on-chain confirmation, you can use our just-in-time channel service. The JIT service will create a 0-conf channel of the amount you specify plus 100k sats of inbound (receiving capacity).

pos.views.Wallet.PosPane.noOrders: Hakuna maagizo yanayofunguliwa kwa sasa. Ili kutuma kwa ZEUS, tia alama kwenye agizo kama 'Aina Nyingine ya Malipo' na maelezo yanayojumuisha 'Zeus', 'BTC', au 'Bitcoin'

pos.views.Settings.PointOfSale.currencyM: Error: currency must be enabled first
views.Settings.NodeConfiguration.restore: Kurejesha mkoba kutafanya kufunga nguvu ya vituo vyako vyote. Fikiria kufunga vituo vyako kwenye kifaa chako cha awali kwanza, ikiwezekana, kuokoa ada na kupata pesa zako haraka zaidi.
views.Settings.NodeConfiguration.embedde: Kwa sasa, nodi za LND zilizoingizwa haziwezi kufutwa ndani ya programu. Lazima uondoe na kufunga tena programu ili kuunda au kurejesha mkoba wa LND ulioingizwa.

Inashauriwa kufunga vituo vyako vyote kwa mikono kabla ya kuhamia kwenye kifaa kingine. Kurejesha bila kufunga vituo mapema kutafanya kufunga kwa nguvu, ambayo itasababisha ada kubwa na inaweza kuchukua hadi wiki mbili kupata pesa zako.
views.Settings.LightningAddress.noPaymen: Hakuna malipo ya kufidia. Angalia baadaye.
views.Settings.LightningAddress.statusEx: Hii ni idadi ya malipo ambayo yanaweza kufanywa kwako wakati uko nje ya mtandao.
Zaidi ya hashi za malipo zitatumwa kiotomatiki kwenye seva wakati inahitajika, ili uweze kuendelea kupokea malipo.
views.Settings.LightningAddress.nostrKey: Onyo: kubadilisha funguo zako za Nostr kutafuta malipo yako yanayosubiri. Tafadhali jipatanishe na malipo yako yanayosubiri kabla ya kuwasilisha funguo mpya.
views.Settings.LightningAddress.explaine: Ili kuanza na anwani ya umeme, lazima kwanza uwe na kituo cha umeme na likiditi ya mapokezi.
Njia rahisi ni kununua kituo cha 0-kuthibitisha kutoka kwa LSP yetu, OLYMPUS by ZEUS. Tengeneza ankara na jilipe kutoka kwa mkoba mwingine wa umeme.
For best results, open up a channel with our node, OLYMPUS by ZEUS.
Kubali malipo kiotomatiki wakati wa kuanza
Kiwango cha uthibitishaji kwa kukubali kiotomatiki
Ikiwezeshwa, OLYMPUS itafungua vituo kwako kiotomatiki wakati haiwezi kupata njia kwako. Hii itahakikisha unaweza kuendelea kupokea malipo na ZEUS PAY.
Kujumuisha miongozo ya njia kutawasaidia LSP kutuma malipo kwako kwa kutumia vituo vyako visivyotangazwa.
Hii ina maana ya faragha kwamba itafunua vituo vyako visivyotangazwa kwa LSP.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.expl: Anwani hii ya umeme inahifadhiwa na kuendeshwa na LSP yetu, OLYMPUS by ZEUS. Inakuruhusu kupokea malipo hata wakati uko nje ya mtandao.

Inatumia hashi za malipo zilizozalishwa kwenye kifaa chako, na ankara za hodl, ambayo inamaanisha LSP inaweza kushikilia pesa kwa muda tu na kuzisambaza kwako, au kuzirudisha kwa mtumaji (baada ya kipindi cha muda wa saa 24), kwa ufanisi kufanya kuwa wa kujitunza.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.pres: Bonyeza ili kufidia malipo kutoka ZEUS PAY.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.vali: Uthibitisho ni sahihi. Bonyeza kuona maelezo.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.inva: Uthibitisho batili au unaopingana. Bonyeza kuona maelezo.
views.Settings.LightningAddressInfo.noAt: Hakuna uthibitisho wa Nostr uliopatikana. Inaonekana pochi ya mtumaji haiisaidii bado.
views.Settings.Attestations.title: Uthibitisho
views.Settings.Attestation.title: Uthibitisho
views.Settings.CurrencyConverter.title: Currency Converter
views.Settings.CurrencyConverter.error: Error fetching rates. Tap to try again.
views.LspExplanation.title: Hizi ada ni zipi?
views.Settings.CustodialWalletWarning.gr: The wallet you are using is custodial. This means that the funds here are not fully in your control, and can be stolen by the operator of the service.
This wallet is more akin to a bank account than a bitcoin wallet. You don't have access to the bitcoin keys, but rather credentials that can be revoked at any moment.
ZEUS has the ability to create a self-custodial wallet in the app. This wallet provides you with a 24-word seed phrase that gives you full control of your funds.
To get started with your own self-custodial wallet, press the button below, and hit the 'Create mainnet wallet' button on the next screen.
views.Settings.CustodialWalletWarning.di: Please confirm the following to dismiss the warning:
I know that I don't have custody of the funds in this wallet without the 12 or 24 word seed phrase
I know that an LNDHub account password is not the same as a seed phrase
I either set up this connection myself or I trust the person who set it up
I'm not just lying to get this over with
view.Settings.LSPServicesList.title: LSP Services
views.LspExplanation.text1: Zeus ni pochi ya umeme ya kujitunza. Ili kutuma au kupokea malipo ya umeme, lazima ufungue channel ya malipo ya umeme, ambayo ina ada ya usanidi.
views.LspExplanation.text2: Marachaeli yakishasakinishwa, utalipa ada za kawaida za mtandao mpaka channel yako itakapopungukiwa na uwezo.
views.LspExplanation.buttonText2: Jifunze zaidi kuhusu jinsi LSP inavyofanya kazi
views.LspExplanationRouting.text1: Kwa kutoa faragha na kuboresha utendaji wa malipo, Mtoa Huduma wa Umeme (LSP) atafanya kazi nzito kwako na mbinu inayoitwa kufunga ankara. Ada ni ndogo; kawaida ni satoshi chache tu.
views.LspExplanationRouting.text2: Unaweza kuzima LSP kabisa na kuokoa ada hizi kwa kuelekea kwenye Mipangilio > Mtoa Huduma wa Umeme (LSP), lakini utasaliti faragha na utendaji wa malipo.
views.LspExplanationWrappedInvoices.text: Ankara zilizofungwa ni ankara zilizo na safu ziada. Kwa kesi hii, LSP itafunga ankara iliyozalishwa kutoka kwenye nodi yako. Ankara iliyofungwa itaonekana kama imezalishwa na LSP.

Hii ina faida mbili: 1) Mtumiaji mwisho hahitaji kufichua muhimili wa umma wa nodi yao kwa watumaji. LSP inamfahamu mpokeaji lakini hakuna mtu mwingine anayejua. 2) Watumaji wanaweza kutumia njia za LSP kufanya malipo badala ya kutafuta njia moja kwa moja kwa mtumiaji mwisho.

Ankara zilizofungwa hutumia hashi ile ile ya awali ya preimage. Hii inamaanisha kwamba LSP hawezi kumaliza malipo bila mpokeaji wa mwisho kumaliza malipo, hivyo LSP hawezi kukimbia na fedha za mtumiaji.
Hakikisha kuweka Zeus wazi unapopokea malipo kwani LSP hawezi kumaliza malipo kwa niaba yako unapokuwa nje ya mtandao.
views.LspExplanationOverview.title: LSP inafanyaje kazi?
views.LspExplanationOverview.text1: LSP hutumia ankara zilizofungwa na channel za 0-conf kuunganisha watumiaji mara moja kwenye mtandao wa Umeme.
views.LspExplanationOverview.text2: Yote unayohitaji kufanya ni kuwa mtumaji alipe ankara Zeus inayokuonyesha, lakini hapa kuna kinachotokea kwa undani:
views.LspExplanationOverview.step1: Mpokeaji anazalisha ankara kwenye nodi yao ya umeme na kisha kuituma kwa LSP
views.LspExplanationOverview.step2: LSP inazalisha ankara iliyofungwa na kuirudisha kwa mpokeaji
views.LspExplanationOverview.step3: Mpokeaji anampa mtumaji ankara iliyofungwa ili wailipe
views.LspExplanationOverview.step4: Mtumaji analipa ankara, ambayo inapitia LSP
views.LspExplanationOverview.step5: LSP inagundua malipo na kufungua channel ya 0-conf kwa mpokeaji
views.LspExplanationOverview.step6: LSP kisha inapeleka malipo kwa mpokeaji kwa kutumia channel mpya na malipo yanakamilika
views.Sweep.title: Safisha pochi ya mtandao wa msingi
views.Sweep.explainer: Kusafisha pochi ya mtandao wa msingi kutatuma salio lililothibitishwa na lisilotathminiwa kwenye anwani ya marudio iliyoainishwa hapo juu.
views.PSBT.channelWarning: DO NOT PUBLISH the finished transaction by yourself or with another tool. LND MUST publish it in the proper funding flow order OR THE FUNDS CAN BE LOST! Ensure you publish in ZEUS and only when the channel ID above is displayed.
views.PSBT.channelsWarning: DO NOT PUBLISH the finished transaction by yourself or with another tool. LND MUST publish it in the proper funding flow order OR THE FUNDS CAN BE LOST! Ensure you publish in ZEUS and only when the channel IDs above are displayed.
views.TxHex.channelWarning: No channel loaded in the channel funding flow engine. DO NOT PUBLISH if this transaction is for a channel open.
components.AlertModal.zeusDetected: ZEUS has detected the following issues:
components.AlertModal.zombieExplainer: Zombie channels indicate stale data on your downloaded network graph.
components.AlertModal.neutrinoExplainer: Neutrino peers with high ping times can cause performance issues in the app.
views.PendingHTLCs.title: Pending HTLCs
views.PendingHTLCs.recommendationIOS: It's recommended to leave ZEUS running while there are pending HTLCs to prevent force closes.
views.PendingHTLCs.recommendationAndroid: It's recommended to enable Persistent LND or leave ZEUS running while there are pending HTLCs to prevent force closes.
